Vulois/Terminess/Octociz and Bronco.

Before Hell Beast can give an answer, a transmission comes through 
from Soundwave: Battera became a TM3! Vulois quickly responded.

"Excellent! Now hurry and bring the driver here. The sooner Hell 
Beast gets it, the sooner we can go home."

Vulois turns back to Hell Beast.

"So, sir, will you grant Terminess her lab?"

______________________________________________________________________


Terminess continued to work dilegently on the Pred base's auto-guns 
and shields.

"Soon, with a lot more work, the auto-guns will activate as soon as 
they detect any signature that is not Predacon within a certain 
distance. They will start firing once the signature gets a bit 
closer. No more motion detection. To get inside the Pred base, a bot 
would have to destroy the auto-guns. Hehehehehe!"

Terminess continues to mumble to herself as she works on the auto-
guns.

______________________________________________________________________

Octociz s now very scared. No Maximal has seemed to respond to 
Bronco's message. Maybe they don't care about him. Maybe they didn't 
get the message. Maybe they have more important things, like an 
attack. Whatever the case, Octociz sucks up his fear and begins to 
pray to The Matrix of Leadership. If he is going to die today, he'll 
do it with honour, and not like a cowardly little school fem-bot. 
Bronco looks at him and smiles.

"We're here. This is a famous spot in Maximal history. See the water 
down there? Buried beneath there is the remnants of the Axalon. The 
original base of the Maximals in the Beast Wars. Optimus Primal, 
Rhinox, Cheetor, Rat Trap, Dino-bot, Tigertron, and Airazor all 
served here with honour and respect. And in one mega-cycle, you will 
die with respect. A simple execution, and then you're body will be 
dumped into the sea to be buried with the Axalon. A true Maximal 
death. What's that? You don't want to die? We'll, you had better 
hurry for your Maximal friends to come save you, and bring me my 
computer, or it's all over."

Octociz resumed his praying, hoping, pleading that the Maximals would 
come in time.
